lang.reset_desc: This will delete your best scorealong with all gems and paid items. Are you sure?
lang.desc_story: Fionna and Marshall Lee were on their way to Lumpy Space Prince's party when a swarm of monsters attacked. Time to bust up some bad guys!
lang.desc_crystal_sword: Fills the sky with crystal shards
lang.desc_energy: Restores some of your energy meter
lang.desc_shield: Blocks enemies form getting past you
lang.desc_knife_storm: Rain steel down upon your enemies
lang.desc_marshall_lee: Unleash the fury of the vampire king
lang.desc_marceline: Unleash the fury of the vampire queen
lang.hint_2: Hit multiple enemies to earn combos.
lang.hint_4: Don't let them get past you.Every miss will cost you energy.
